Translations.Text: Nandao buxindao zhe, renwei keyi she wo er yi wo de zhong pu wei baohu zhe ma? Wo que yi yubei huo yu wei bu xindao zhe de zhaodaisuo.
Ni shuo:`Wo gaosu nimen zai hang wei fangmian zui chikui de ren, hao ma?
Tamen jiushi zai jinshi shenghuo zhong tulaowugong, er renwei ziji shi shoufa qiaomiao de ren.'
Zhe deng ren bu xin tamen de zhu de jixiang, ye bu xin jiang yu ta xiang hui, suoyi tamen zai jinshi shenghuo zhong de shangong bian wei wuxiao de, fuhuo ri wo bu wei tamen shuli quanheng.
Tamen de baochou shi huo yu, yinwei tamen bu xindao, bingqie ba wo de jixiang he shizhe dangzuo xiaobing.
Xindao erqie xingshan zhe, deyi leyuan wei zhaodaisuo,
bing yong ju qizhong, bu yuan qian chu.
Ni shuo:`Jiaruo yi haishui wei mozhi, yong lai jizai wo de zhu de yanci, namo, haishui biding yong jin, er wo de zhu de yanci shangwei qiongjin, jishi women yi tong liang di haishui buchong zhi.'

Ni shuo:`Wo zhishi yige tong nimen yiyang de fanren, wo feng de qishi shi: Nimen suo yingdang chongbai de, zhishi yige zhuzai, gu shui xiwang yu ta de zhu xiang hui, jiu jiao shui li xingshan gong, jiao shui buyao yi renhe wu yu ta de zhu shou tongyang de chongbai.'
